max_retries.description: Max times the provisioner will retry in case of failure. Defaults to zero (0). Zero means an error will not be retried.

only.description: Only run the provisioner for listed builder(s) by name.

override.description: Override the builder with different settings for a specific builder.

timeout.description: If the provisioner takes more than for example `1h10m1s` or `10m` to finish, the provisioner will timeout and fail.
